summary: dragonbone stat upgrade. pics were made while I was using a texture mod.
descriptionHtml:
It always bothered me that daedric armor is better than dragonbone armor.After all, dragons are the main villain, you have to get to 100 in smithing to make dragon bone in the first place and it\'s unique to your character. This mod makes dragonbone a little better than daedric armor.

Note: The dragonbone is using the molten armor mod. You can find it here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2948
author: Tobor123
